sentences.en: Any history of bombing must also be a history of civilian casualty, for bombing saves the lives of soldiers only at the expense of other lives.
sentences.cn: 任何空袭的历史也必定是平民伤亡的历史，因为空袭救了士兵的性命只能以其他人的生命为代价。

sentences.en: I was taken to casualty at St Thomas's Hospital.
sentences.cn: 我被送往圣·托马斯医院的急救室。

sentences.en: In the medical disaster - response model, the casualty collection point performs two functions.
sentences.cn: 在灾害应对医疗方案里, 伤员集中区有两项职能.

sentences.en: Never apply water to a burn from an electric shock while the casualty is still in contact with the electric current.
sentences.cn: 当被电击者还连着电时，千万不要把水弄到电击伤口上。

sentences.en: No casualty and damage in the area has been reported so far.
sentences.cn: 暂时未有伤亡和破坏在该地区已报告.

sentences.en: Our aim is to reduce road casualties .
sentences.cn: 我们的目标是减少交通事故的伤亡人数。

sentences.en: She read through the casualty list anxiously.
sentences.cn: 她忧虑地把伤亡人员名单从头到尾看了一遍.

sentences.en: Small shops have been a casualty of the recession.
sentences.cn: 小商店在经济萧条中深受其害.

sentences.en: The car industry has been one of the greatest casualties of the recession.
sentences.cn: 汽车工业是经济不景气最大的受害者之一。

sentences.en: The casualty of the Iraqi troops was more than 85,000.
sentences.cn: 伊军的伤亡人数达8.5万之多.

sentences.en: The casualty of the murder case didnt want to appear in public.
sentences.cn: 这件凶杀案的受害这不愿意出现在公众场合.

sentences.en: The first item always on that was the overnight casualty report from Iraq and Afghanistan, and I would often come and see that had been circled by the president or that he would be reflecting on that.
sentences.cn: 上面的第一条永远是,这一晚在伊拉克和阿富汗,士兵的伤亡报告，我来的时候会看到那条消息,被布什总统圈了出来,他看着报告会陷入沉思。

sentences.en: The property sector was another casualty of the lurch towards higher interest rates.
sentences.cn: 房地产业是受利率猛然攀高影响的又一重灾区。

sentences.en: The rebels have inflicted heavy casualties .
sentences.cn: 叛乱者造成了大量的伤亡。

sentences.en: There are fears that the casualty toll may be higher.
sentences.cn: 有人担心伤亡总数可能会更高。

sentences.en: They also gave warning that casualty figures are to rise.
sentences.cn: 他们也给出预报说伤亡人数还会增加.

sentences.en: Training includes realistic simulation of casualty procedures.
sentences.cn: 培训包括对急救过程的真实模拟。

sentences.en: Two years ago, Citigroup demerged its Travelers property and casualty business.
sentences.cn: 两年前, 花旗集团将从事财产及灾害险业务的旅行者公司分拆了出来.

sentences.en: VI Design and Usage of PICC Property and Casualty Company Ltd.
sentences.cn: 中国人保寿险有限公司vi设计的应用.

sentences.en: We have had our first casualty. One runner has dropped out with cramp.
sentences.cn: 我们有了第一位伤员，有一位队员因腿部痉挛退出了。

sentences.en: When truths collide, compromise becomes the first casualty ( Henry A. Kissinger )
sentences.cn: 当事实相互抵触时, 首当其冲的受害者是妥协 ( 亨利A. 基辛格 )

phrases.tran_cn: 灾害保险；不幸事故保险

trans.tran_cn: 伤亡人员，受害者，急诊室
trans.tran_en: someone who is hurt or killed in an accident or war
